com.netflix.genie.server.services
Interface HiveConfigService

All Known Implementing Classes:
PersistentHiveConfigImpl
public interface HiveConfigService

Abstraction layer to encapsulate data HiveConfig functionality.
Classes implementing this abstraction layer must be thread-safe.

Method Summary
 HiveConfigResponse createHiveConfig(HiveConfigRequest request)
          Create new hive config.
 HiveConfigResponse deleteHiveConfig(java.lang.String id)
          Delete a hive config from database.

          Get Hive config for various params.

          Insert/update hive config.

getHiveConfig

Returns:
successful response, or one with an HTTP error code

getHiveConfig

HiveConfigResponse getHiveConfig(java.lang.String id,
                                 java.lang.String name,
                                 java.lang.String type)
Get Hive config for various params.

Parameters:
id - unique id for config (can be null)
name - name for config (can be null)
type - type for config (can be null)
Returns:
successful response, or one with an HTTP error code

createHiveConfig

Create new hive config.

Parameters:
request - contains the hive config element for creation
Returns:
successful response, or one with an HTTP error code

updateHiveConfig

HiveConfigResponse updateHiveConfig(HiveConfigRequest request)
Insert/update hive config.

Parameters:
request - contains the hive config element for update, must contain valid id
Returns:
successful response, or one with an HTTP error code

deleteHiveConfig

Delete a hive config from database.

Parameters:
id - unique id for config to delete
Returns:
successful response, or one with an HTTP error code
